sentences.sContent: His murder triggered vicious race riots (= caused by a problem between different races ) .
sentences.sCn: 他的被杀引发了严重的种族骚乱。

sentences.sContent: police in bullet-proof vests and carrying riot shields
sentences.sCn: 穿防弹背心、持防暴盾牌的警察

words.tran: 暴乱的；狂欢的；不受约束的；放荡的；茂盛的

trans.tranOther: a situation in which a large crowd of people are behaving in a violent and uncontrolled way, especially when they are protesting about something
if a crowd of people riot, they behave in a violent and uncontrolled way, for example by fighting the police and damaging cars or buildings
